name: Peerby
description: Peerby is a leading application in the 'sharing economy', enabling people to borrow the things they need from others in their neighborhood. They have raised more than $4.7M in funding.

name: Unito
description: Unito is a no-code integration solution that allows you to connect your apps and automate your workflows in minutes. They raised a $20M Series B round in October 2022 led by CDPQ's Equity 253 fund.

name: CINETPAY
description: CinetPay lets merchants across Francophone Africa accept Mobile Money and other payments forms. They announced $2.4M in funding from 4DX Ventures and Flutterwave in December 2021.

name: TESPIRE LLC
description: Tespire developed a web/mobile app to help primary & secondary school owners in semi-urban Africa to boost income, block revenue leakages through a tablet device. They raised an undisclosed amount in October 2024.

name: ShapShap
description: ShapShap is a mobile marketplace app for ordering food, groceries, and more within your city for pickup or same day parcel delivery. They raised seed funding from GreenTec Capital in 2021.

name: Checkbox
description: Checkbox is a no-code app builder for legal, HR, risk and compliance teams. They raised AUD $6.3M in a January 2022 pre-Series A led by Sequoia scale-up program Surge, and Tidal Ventures.

name: APPOTA Corp
description: Appota is a pioneer in providing technology solutions and platforms for digital entertainment industry, and an industry leader in Southeast Asia. The company has raised series C funding.

name: Comparamejor.com
description: ComparaMejor is a leading LATAM site to find and apply for financial products. The company raised $5M+ in funding, and was acquired in 2019 by ComparaOnline.

name: Ceres Robotics Inc
description: Ceres Robotics designs and builds robotic landers for lunar and planetary surface space missions. The company is approved by NASA to participate in commercial lunar payload Artemis missions.

name: Padash
description: Padash helps you deliver to customers at 5x cheaper commission than other apps by fulfilling the delivery yourself, especially to customers who live close to you. They raised $115k in Angel investment

name: MyTM Private Limited
description: MyTM is a mass transit e-ticketing platform to search and buy tickets directly for air, bus, and cinema through the MyTM mobile app or network of retailers. They have raised $7.2M+ in funding.

name: Capsl Entertainment
description: CAPSL Entertainment is the developer of mobile esports tournament platform BAASH. The company raised more than USD $400k, and announced BAASH was acquired by Coda Payments in Q4 2021.

name: PaySika
description: PaySika is the first neo-bank in Africa to offer banking services on popular messengers such as WhatsApp, Messenger and Telegram. They announced a â‚¬300k pre-seed angel in October 2021.

name: Foodini
description: Foodini is a mobile app for people with special dietary needs to discover the best restaurants, with dietitian reviewed menus tailored to your personal needs. They raised a $700k pre-seed in October 2022.
